name: Iron Heart (E1e5en)
description:
The game "Iron Heart" was created for the Gaminator 21 contest (theme "Our masks and secrets").

You control a robotic loader (water carrier) on a spaceship. During the flight, the robot turns on and receives a message...

Controls:

Keyboard:

- A, left arrow - move left;

- D, right arrow - movement to the right;

- S, down arrow - jump off the platform;

- W, up arrow - jump;

- Space - brake;

- F - activate;

- Q - open/close the left hatch;

- E - open/close the right hatch;

- Escape - pause menu;

- F11 - on/off full screen mode.

Gamepad:

- D-Pad Left, Left Stick Left - move to the left;

- D-Pad Right, Left Stick Right - move to the right;

- D-Pad Down, Left Stick Down - jump off the platform;

- DualShock Cross, Xbox A, Nintendo B - jump;

- DualShock Circle, Xbox B, Nintendo A - brake;

- DualShock Square, Xbox X, Nintendo Y - activate;

- L, L1 - open/close the left hatch;

- R, R1 - open/close the right hatch;

- Start, DualShock Share, Nintendo- - pause menu;

- Select, DualShock Options, Nintendo+ - on/off. full screen mode.

Localization:

- English, Russian

The language is determined depending on the language in the OS.

Tools:

- Godot Engine (3.2.3);

- Affinity Designer;

- GarageBand;

- ProTools.
